meanings.definition: Not able to be described or expressed in words.
meanings.sent1: The beauty of the sunset was truly undescribable.
meanings.sent2: The feeling of joy she experienced was truly undescribable.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt to dance was undescribable but hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The mountain peak, covered in mist, was an undescribable sight.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the exotic fruit was so undescribable that it left me speechless.

meanings.sent1: The magical performance left the audience in an undescribable awe.
meanings.sent2: The mysterious creature had an undescribable aura around it.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so delicious, it was almost undescribable.
meanings.sent4: The bond between the two friends was an undescribable connection.
meanings.sent5: The starry night sky was an undescribable masterpiece of nature.
